name: Gelatinous Cube
description:
Made following the rules of the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3, with the theme - Less is More. It was not submitted on time, so the game is a standalone.

Gelatinous Cube is a platformer with 5 levels, where your character gets rid of abilities to better focus on what he can do, all the while an entity tries to make him reconsider his 'Less is More' choice.

Controls

Move with <- | -> or A | D

Jump with ^ or W or Spacebar

The longer you hold the jump button, the higher you will go.

When applicable:

Dash with C

Double jump by jumping in the air.
